Description.Text:
This modern, clean and bright centrally located property is in the heart of London's West End, close to all London's major attractions, theatres, restaurants, bars and shops. The friendly multilingual staff at Gloucester Place Hotel's 24-hour front desk can advise on local attractions and book restaurants and excursions. There is also a safe-deposit box at reception where guests can leave valuables. Nearby parking is available for guests who need it.
All rooms have modern decor, satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot bufet Continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 GBP per person

Oxford Street and Marble Arch shopping) - 500 metres, Selfridges department store - 500 metres Madame Tussauds - 1 mile (1.5 kilometres), Regents Park - 1 mile (1.5 kilometres), Soho - 1 mile (1.5 kilometres), Shaftesbury Avenue (Theatreland) - 1.5 miles (2 kilometres), Chinatown- 1.5 miles (2 kilometres), Buckingham Palace - 2.5 miles (4 kilometres), Houses of Parliament - 2.5 miles (4 kilometres), London Eye - 3 miles (5 kilometres)

Basic Double / Twin (shared bathroom outside the room) - A Basic Double or Twin Room with two single beds one double bed or two single beds (make a request for bed arrangement; subject to availability) with a outside common bathroom next to the room (shared with one room only). All Rooms have modern dcor, satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless and dial-up Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot Continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 GBP per person
Superior Double / Twin - A Superior Double / Twin is a large room with one double or two single beds (make a request for bed arrangement; subject to availability) with En-suite bathroom and a sofa with seating area with modern decor, satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless and dial-up Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot Continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 per person
Triple Room - En-suite Triple Room - one Double bed and one Single bed. An extra bed could be added on request in advance; subject to availability. All Rooms have modern decor, satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless and dial-up Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot Continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 GBP per person
Basic Single (shared bathroom outside of the room) - A Basic Single Room with one single bed with a outside common bathroom next to the room (shared with one room only). All Rooms have modern dcor, satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless and dial-up Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot Continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 GBP per person
Superior Single - En-suite Single Room (shower, toilet and basin inside the room) with a small double bed. All Rooms have modern dcor, satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless and dial-up Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 GBP per person
Standard Double - Standard Ensuite Double Room (shower, toilet and basin inside the room) with one double bed. All Rooms have modern dcor, Satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless and dial up Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot Continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 GBP per person
Family Room - Family Room En-suite (shower, toilet and basin inside the room) is a large family room with one double and two single beds. All Rooms have modern decor, satellite TV, direct-dial telephone, free wireless and dial-up Internet, small fridge, hair dryer, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. Price includes hot Bufet Continental Breakfast. English, Mediterranean or Vegetarian Breakfast is 3 GBP per person
